entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
